entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Fog patches this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
